name: chapter_6_examples
description: Code examples for chapter 6 of TensorFlow.js Quick Start Guide

scripts.run-examples: npx babel index.js --out-file compiled/index.js && node compiled/index.js
scripts.run-real-world-example: npx babel real_world_example.js --out-file compiled/real_world_example.js && node compiled/real_world_example.js

author: Jamal O'Garro
